### 读取数据页
页头、页尾、slot均为数值类型，按从右向左读
数据中数值类型及字符类型数据均从左向右读取
如数据行0x000003e8为int，正常顺序显示，页头偏移量为0x30，4字节从右向左读
```
dd if=/data/gbase/rootdbschk002 skip=48 count=1 bs=2k |hexdump -C
```
```
00000000  30 00 00 00 03 00 16 07  04 00 01 08 28 00 c4 07  |0...........(...|
00000010  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 80 00 00 00  |................|
00000020  00 00 03 e8 7f ff ff ff  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  |................|
00000030  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  |................|
*
000007e0  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 24 00 04 00  |............$...|
000007f0  20 00 04 00 1c 00 04 00  18 00 04 00 23 07 06 00  | ...........#...|
00000800
```
```
dd if=/data/gbase/rootdbschk002 skip=48 count=1 bs=2k conv=swab|od -x
```
```
0000000 3000 0000 0300 1607 0400 0108 2800 c407
0000020 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 8000 0000
0000040 0000 03e8 7fff ffff 0000 0000 0000 0000
0000060 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
*
0003740 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 2400 0400
0003760 2000 0400 1c00 0400 1800 0400 2307 0600
0004000
```
### 读取保留页
数值类型从右向左读取，页头页尾slot均为数值，从右向左读取
字符类型从左向右读取
```
dd if=/data/gbase/rootdbschk002 skip=48 count=1 bs=2k |hexdump -C
```
```
00000000  00 00 00 00 01 00 22 6a  03 00 00 18 30 01 c0 06  |......"j....0...|
00000010  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  47 42 61 73 65 20 44 61  |........GBase Da|
00000020  74 61 62 61 73 65 20 53  65 72 76 65 72 20 43 6f  |tabase Server Co|
00000030  70 79 72 69 67 68 74 20  32 30 30 31 2c 20 32 30  |pyright 2001, 20|
00000040  32 31 20 20 47 65 6e 65  72 61 6c 20 44 61 74 61  |21  General Data|
00000050  20 43 6f 72 70 6f 72 61  74 69 6f 6e 00 00 00 00  | Corporation....|
00000060  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 03 00 00 08 00 00  |................|
00000070  ce 50 70 65 20 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 f4 01 00 00  |.Ppe ...........|
00000080  31 32 31 34 01 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 ce 50 70 65  |1214.........Ppe|
00000090  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  |................|
*
00000110  00 00 00 00 03 00 10 00  e3 d7 00 00 01 00 00 00  |................|
00000120  00 00 00 00 d1 e5 3d 32  31 32 2d 32 30 32 33 00  |......=212-2023.|
00000130  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00  |................|
*
000007f0  14 01 1c 00 00 00 00 00  18 00 fc 00 21 6a 02 00  |............!j..|
00000800
```
```
dd if=/data/gbase/rootdbschk002 skip=48 count=1 bs=2k conv=swab|od -x
```
```
0000000 0000 0000 0100 226a 0300 0018 3001 c006
0000020 0000 0000 0000 0000 4742 6173 6520 4461
0000040 7461 6261 7365 2053 6572 7665 7220 436f
0000060 7079 7269 6768 7420 3230 3031 2c20 3230
0000100 3231 2020 4765 6e65 7261 6c20 4461 7461
0000120 2043 6f72 706f 7261 7469 6f6e 0000 0000
0000140 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0300 0008 0000
0000160 ce50 7065 2000 0000 0000 0000 f401 0000
0000200 3132 3134 0100 0000 0000 0000 ce50 7065
0000220 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
*
0000420 0000 0000 0300 1000 e3d7 0000 0100 0000
0000440 0000 0000 d1e5 3d32 3132 2d32 3032 3300
0000460 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
*
0003760 1401 1c00 0000 0000 1800 fc00 216a 0200
0004000
```
